1547680.name: RPG Maker MZ - Steampunk Town Tiles
1547680.description:
With hissing of escaped steam and clanging of pipes and gears, the Steampunk Town is ready for exploration and adventure!

A masterful blend of classic prim Victorian style and heavy machinery, Steampunk is a beloved genre that is bound to make your players curious and amazed. Combining stone with iron and gears, Steampunk Town Tiles includes a variety of basics you'll need to begin creating a novel and engaging environment. Created by Sherman3D, Steampunk Town Tiles is a fantastic new tile pack for your growing library of RPG Maker MV resources.

FEATURES:

  • Basics needed to create a Steampunk-inspired town.
  • Sample project with ideas on how to use the material.
  • Bonus: Character (Verne) with walking sprite and side-view battler.

    Terms of Use:

    * This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series only
    * OK to be used in Commercial projects
    * Contents can be edited
    * OK for use in games with gore
    * OK for use in adult-rated games
1547680.supported_languages: 英语, 日语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 俄语, 简体中文, 繁体中文, 韩语
